title: When you win a close fight and the enemy jungler ganks you

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} Naw bitch, that's not a gank.

That's a free kill.
As {{champion:82}}, it's important to keep wards out to watch for incoming ~~ganks~~ double kills.

When the jungler comes to gank right after {{champion:122}} dunks his opponent.

Q > R 

#**DOUBLE KILL**

{{champion:122}} _TOO EASY!_
When you pull off a combo that'll let you barely win the fight and the jungler comes in just to tap you and save his later.
And the one you just killed gets the assist.
''I'll just push the wave real quick to make sure it's in a favorable position when I get back so I don't get gan- aaaaaaaaaaaaand I'm dead''

That moment as karthus when you win the close fight, but then the enemy jungle comes in to finish you off and you just got your level 6 from that fight
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/05/evil-laugh-reaction-gif.gif?gs=a

STORY TIME: 
so i was jungler udyr, right after SGU came out, and I WRECKED FACE midlane. took down, like, 3 or 4 members of their team counterganking for our mid. just as I'm celebrating in chat and getting ready to back, I get a boosted jayce q to the face from offscreen. boom, dead.
And then the top laner you just beat says "Get rekt m8"
And the worst thing is when they get the assist.
This is me every time. It's also me every time i actually kill them too after a gank xD
